cause.description:
So many people are too serious about life and need to "just relax" as some people would say... This cause has the sole purpose of fighting maturity in teens... So help us by wearing stupid hats on the 30th of july.. tell all your friends about it!!!
1. it is a global right to freedom of expresion
cause.mission: Stop maturity!!! Have fun while you are the right age
cause.name: Maturity is a crime
